summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4705 for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 19 and 20, Supplemental Crown Addition, being the alley from West Howe Street to West Blaine Street, between 10th Avenue West and 11th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54511, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
